about_the_game:
This small cosmetic add-on is designed for players who want to support the development team, after all, they made this game - and its user-generated content (UGC) - free. This allows everyone to experience the Dark Lord's story and create their own masterpieces using the user-friendly editor, which can be shared with thousands of players worldwide.

The Supporter Pack includes:
• A unique cursor
• Additional table appearance in the story campaign
• Exclusive design for all cards

short_description: A small add-on to support the game developers. This DLC includes additional visual materials that will make your gaming experience more diverse and unique.
